verses.verse: Put <WG5279> them <WG846> in mind <WG5279> to be subject <WG5293> to principalities <WG746> and <WG2532> powers <WG1849>, to obey magistrates <WG3980>, to be <WG1511> ready <WG2092> to <WG4314> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>,
To speak evil of <WG987> no man <WG3367>, to be <WG1511> no brawlers <WG269>, but gentle <WG1933>, shewing <WG1731> all <WG3956> meekness <WG4236> unto <WG4314> all <WG3956> men <WG444>.

For <WG1063> we ourselves <WG2249> also <WG2532> were <WG2258> <WG453> sometimes <WG4218> foolish <WG453>, disobedient <WG545>, deceived <WG4105>, serving <WG1398> divers <WG4164> lusts <WG1939> and <WG2532> pleasures <WG2237>, living <WG1236> in <WG1722> malice <WG2549> and <WG2532> envy <WG5355>, hateful <WG4767>, and hating <WG3404> one another <WG240>.
But <WG1161> after <WG3753> that the kindness <WG5544> and <WG2532> love <WG5363> of God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990> toward man <WG5363> appeared <WG2014>,

Not <WG3756> by <WG1537> works <WG2041> of <WG1722> righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3739> we <WG2249> have done <WG4160>, but <WG235> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> mercy <WG1656> he saved <WG4982> us <WG2248>, by <WG1223> the washing <WG3067> of regeneration <WG3824>, and <WG2532> renewing <WG342> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>;
Which <WG3739> he shed <WG1632> on <WG1909> us <WG2248> abundantly <WG4146> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>;
That <WG2443> being justified by <WG1344> his <WG1565> grace <WG5485>, we should be made <WG1096> heirs <WG2818> according to <WG2596> the hope <WG1680> of eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.

This is a faithful <WG4103> saying <WG3056>, and <WG2532> these things <WG4012> <WG5130> I will <WG1014> that thou <WG4571> affirm constantly <WG1226>, that <WG2443> they which have believed <WG4100> in God <WG2316> might be careful <WG5431> to maintain <WG4291> good <WG2570> works <WG2041>. These things <WG5023> are <WG2076> good <WG2570> and <WG2532> profitable <WG5624> unto men <WG444>.

But <WG1161> avoid <WG4026> foolish <WG3474> questions <WG2214>, and <WG2532> genealogies <WG1076>, and <WG2532> contentions <WG2054>, and <WG2532> strivings about <WG3163> the law <WG3544>; for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> unprofitable <WG512> and <WG2532> vain <WG3152>.
A man <WG444> that is an heretick <WG141> after <WG3326> the first <WG3391> and <WG2532> second <WG1208> admonition <WG3559> reject <WG3868>;
Knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> he that is such <WG5108> is subverted <WG1612>, and <WG2532> sinneth <WG264>, being <WG5607> condemned of himself <WG843>.

When <WG3752> I shall send <WG3992> Artemas <WG734> unto <WG4314> thee <WG4571>, or <WG2228> Tychicus <WG5190>, be diligent <WG4704> to come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165> to <WG1519> Nicopolis <WG3533>: for <WG1063> I have determined <WG2919> there <WG1563> to winter <WG3914>.
Bring <WG4311> Zenas <WG2211> the lawyer <WG3544> and <WG2532> Apollos <WG625> on their journey <WG4311> diligently <WG4709>, that <WG2443> nothing <WG3367> be wanting <WG3007> unto them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> let <WG3129> ours <WG2251> also <WG2532> learn <WG3129> to maintain <WG4291> good <WG2570> works <WG2041> for <WG1519> necessary <WG316> uses <WG5532>, that <WG3363> they be <WG5600> not <WG3363> unfruitful <WG175>.

All <WG3956> that are with <WG3326> me <WG1700> salute <WG782> thee <WG4571>. Greet <WG782> them that love <WG5368> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> the faith <WG4102>. Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>. Amen <WG281>. Â¶ It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
